meanings.definition: The state or quality of being like pork in taste or texture.
meanings.sent1: The porkiness of the bacon made it irresistible to the guests.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the porkiness of the ribs at my favorite barbecue restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked about the porkiness of the roast, saying it was as juicy as a watermelon.
meanings.sent4: The porkiness of the ham was so pronounced that it seemed to melt in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The porkiness of the sausage was so intense that it lingered on my taste buds for hours.

meanings.sent1: Her doctor advised her to reduce the porkiness in her diet to improve her health.
meanings.sent2: The pig's porkiness was evident from its round belly and waddling walk.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character comically embraced his porkiness, always looking for the next snack.
meanings.sent4: The porkiness of the bear in winter was a sign of its successful hibernation.
meanings.sent5: The porkiness of the cat made it a favorite among the neighborhood children for cuddling.
